about.name: Loc Nguyen
about.profile: I am a software engineer seeking an opportunity to apply for a fullstack developer position. I have been working with JavaScript, TypeScript, NestJS, MySQL, and MongoDB on many projects. I am genuinely interested in and passionate about web development, which drives me to keep learning and practicing. I am always striving to improve my skills and solve problems.
about.contact: The easiest way to connect with me:

datech.name: DANG AN TECH COMPANY LIMITED (DA.Tech)
datech.body: Frontend developer - Collaborated to develop and convert the frontend for POS System Viet247.vn and integrated economical invoices

ems.name: Quizzes & Exam papers management system
ems.body: Developed a management system for managing quizzes and exam papers and automatic generation of exam papers, and provided data management support for the system.

lms.name: Laboratory management system
lms.body: A RESTful API system have been designed to manage lab equipment, tools, and chemicals. The system provides a comfortable way to transfer, borrow, and return items in management processing.

lmsApp.name: Laboratory borrowing application(android only)
lmsApp.body: The application is used to manage information, and borrowing the items for the Laboratory management system.

hiCoffeePos.name: Hi-Coffee POS
hiCoffeePos.body: The POS system for Fnb (not included raw materials management) used to manage products, categories, areas, tables, users, permission, ordering, cash payment, invoices and statistics

hiCoffeeApp.name: Hi-Coffee Application
hiCoffeeApp.body: The order application is build for staffs to help customers ordering products at shop(by Hi-Coffee APIs).
